author: potuz
content: Ohh I am not aware if anyone has actually carried a detailed analysis on the attestation side, but <@1022784528579842079> has been doing some interesting work on rewards data, and I believe <@602753420033785856> is pushing for metric standarization towards this. I'd suggest you get in touch with Kevin to see if you guys can join forces. I'm happy to help on this as I would love to see aggregated attestation performance information
